author: Danielle Zoellner, Danielle Zoellner
title: Coronavirus: Fox News correspondent claims governors' stay-home-orders are 'unconstitutional'
description: Andrew Napolitano argues residents could have a legal standing over states post-pandemic
content:
A Fox News correspondent and former judge has claimed governors' stay-at-home orders are "unconstitutional" and would not hold up in court.
Andrew Napolitano made the claim on Fox & Friends on Tuesday as protesters across the US gather to challenge stay-… [+2768 chars]
